bibl.bibl: [Cobbe, Frances Power.] 1872a. The consciousness of dogs. Quarterly Review 133: 419–51.
bibl.idno: Online, British periodical 1 & 2, October 1872 issue of QR: but nb they give as title the first work reviewed, Researches in the history of the British dog. She mentions a few anecdotes from the books cited, but she doesn’t really review any of the books. Check hard copy for vol. no.; online it isn’t clear.
